mainTitle.title: Doctor Sergey Tunitsky - Modern Gynecology and Surgical Treatment
mainTitle.description:
Dr. Sergey Tunitsky is a renowned Israeli gynecologist, a specialist of the highest category, and a recognized expert in the treatment of all forms of female infertility and diseases of the female reproductive system. He applies modern clinical protocols, minimally invasive surgical techniques, and an individual approach to each patient.

Dr. Tunitsky's clinical experience exceeds 25 years. His expertise in diagnosis, surgical treatment, and prevention of gynecological diseases makes him one of the most sought-after specialists in Israel.
mainTitle.biographyText:
Dr. Sergey Tunitsky has progressed from a medical institute graduate to chief physician of the gynecological department and leading surgeon.

Clinical Positions:
• Chief Physician of the Gynecological Department at Hillel Yaffe Hospital
• Leading Gynecologist at Herzliya Medical Center

He combines clinical practice, teaching activities, and participation in international gynecology conferences, constantly improving his professional skills.
mainTitle.subtitle: Expert in Women's Health

trustCareBanner.title: Trust and care - your source of peace and health

gynecology.title: Gynecological Surgery
gynecology.description: Dr. Sergey Tunitsky specializes in modern gynecological surgery, offering comprehensive treatment for various women's health conditions. With over 25 years of experience, he performs both routine and complex surgical procedures using minimally invasive techniques. Our approach combines advanced medical technology with personalized care to ensure optimal outcomes for every patient. We treat a wide range of gynecological conditions including fibroids, endometriosis, ovarian diseases, and various forms of cancer. Each treatment plan is carefully tailored to meet individual needs and health goals.

gynecologicalDiseases.title: Gynecology
gynecologicalDiseases.description: Comprehensive diagnosis and treatment of various gynecological conditions affecting women's reproductive health and overall well-being.

gynecologicalSurgery.title: Surgery
gynecologicalSurgery.description: Advanced surgical procedures for treating gynecological conditions using modern minimally invasive techniques and equipment.

oncologicalSurgeries.title: Oncology
oncologicalSurgeries.description: Specialized surgical treatment for gynecological cancers including ovarian, cervical, endometrial, and other reproductive system malignancies.

plasticSurgery.title: Plastic Surgery
plasticSurgery.description: Cosmetic and reconstructive surgical procedures for the female reproductive system, including labiaplasty and hymenoplasty.

uterineFibroids.title: Uterine fibroids
uterineFibroids.description: Treatment of benign uterine tumors including myomectomy, hysterectomy, and other surgical interventions for fibroid management.

endometriosis.title: Endometriosis
endometriosis.description: Surgical treatment of endometriosis including laparoscopic excision of endometrial implants and cyst removal procedures.

ovarianDiseases.title: Ovarian diseases
ovarianDiseases.description: Diagnosis and surgical treatment of various ovarian conditions including cysts, tumors, and other pathological changes.

polyps.title: Polyps
polyps.description: Removal of endometrial and cervical polyps through hysteroscopic and other minimally invasive surgical techniques.

gynecologyPlanned.mainTitle: Gynecologist in Israel offers professional diagnostics, treatment, and consultations with care for women's health
gynecologyPlanned.mainDescription: Appointment with an experienced gynecologist in Israel: diagnostics, treatment, prevention, and support for women's health. Modern methods, ultrasound, tests, treatment of inflammations, hormonal disorders, and pregnancy planning. Individual approach, delicacy, and trust — private practice of the doctor.
gynecologyPlanned.seoTitle: Gynecological Care and Surgery - Dr. Serge Tunitski Clinic
gynecologyPlanned.seoDescription: Comprehensive gynecological care including planned, moderate-risk, and emergency surgeries. Professional diagnostics and treatment with modern methods.

plannedSurgeries.title: Planned Surgeries
plannedSurgeries.description: Planned gynecological surgeries are carefully scheduled procedures for treating chronic conditions that significantly impact quality of life. These surgeries include treatment of uterine fibroids, endometriosis, ovarian diseases, pelvic organ prolapse, and severe cervical dysplasia. Each case requires thorough pre-operative preparation, including comprehensive diagnostics and evaluation of the patient's overall health. Our approach ensures optimal timing for surgery and best possible outcomes with minimal recovery time.

moderateRiskSurgeries.title: Moderate-Risk Surgeries
moderateRiskSurgeries.description: Moderate-risk gynecological surgeries address conditions that may affect fertility and require specialized expertise. These procedures include treatment of chronic hydrosalpinx, adhesive disease of pelvic organs causing infertility, vaginal septum excision, and polyp removal. These surgeries require careful planning and precise execution to preserve reproductive function while effectively treating the underlying condition. We use advanced laparoscopic and hysteroscopic techniques to minimize invasiveness.

emergencySurgeries.title: Emergency Surgeries
emergencySurgeries.description: Emergency gynecological surgeries are performed for acute conditions requiring immediate intervention to preserve life and health. These include treatment of ruptured ovarian cysts, uterine perforation, pyosalpinx, tubo-ovarian abscess, and ectopic pregnancy. Time is critical in these cases, and our team is equipped to provide rapid diagnosis and immediate surgical treatment 24/7. We prioritize patient safety and use minimally invasive techniques whenever possible, even in emergency situations.

surgeryCancer.mainTitle: Gynecologic Oncology — Diagnosis, Oncological Surgeries, and Cancer Treatment by an Experienced Gynecologist Surgeon
surgeryCancer.mainDescription: Comprehensive gynecologic oncology care by an experienced gynecologist and surgeon. Diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of female cancers including endometrial, cervical, uterine, vaginal, vulvar, and fallopian tube cancers. Advanced oncological surgeries, personalized treatment plans, and compassionate care aimed at preserving health, fertility, and quality of life.
surgeryCancer.seoTitle: Gynecologic Oncology and Cancer Surgery - Dr. Serge Tunitski
surgeryCancer.seoDescription: Expert gynecologic oncology care: diagnosis and surgical treatment of endometrial, cervical, uterine, vaginal, vulvar cancers and other gynecological malignancies.

surgeryImportant.mainTitle: Gynecologic Surgery — Laparoscopy, Hysteroscopy, and Complex Reconstructive Procedures by a Skilled Gynecologist Surgeon
surgeryImportant.mainDescription: Comprehensive gynecologic surgery services including laparoscopic and hysteroscopic procedures performed by an experienced gynecologist surgeon. Expertise in ovarian cystectomy, myomectomy, hysterectomy, endometriosis excision, and treatment of uterine and cervical conditions. Minimally invasive techniques, precision, and personalized care focused on restoring women's health and improving quality of life.
surgeryImportant.seoTitle: Gynecologic Surgery and Procedures - Dr. Serge Tunitski
surgeryImportant.seoDescription: Expert gynecologic surgery: laparoscopy, hysteroscopy, myomectomy, hysterectomy, and complex reconstructive procedures by an experienced surgeon.

importantSurgeries.title: Important Surgeries
importantSurgeries.description: Essential gynecological procedures addressing common conditions affecting women's reproductive health. These surgeries include laparoscopic and hysteroscopic techniques for treating ovarian cysts, uterine fibroids, endometrial polyps, and ectopic pregnancies. Each procedure is performed with precision using minimally invasive methods to reduce recovery time and improve outcomes. Our approach prioritizes patient safety, comfort, and preservation of fertility whenever possible.
importantSurgeries.vacuumAspiration: Vacuum Aspiration of the Uterine Cavity

complexSurgeries.title: Complex Surgeries
complexSurgeries.description: Advanced surgical procedures requiring specialized expertise and experience. These operations address complex gynecological conditions including severe endometriosis, pelvic organ prolapse, stress incontinence, and ovarian disorders. Each surgery is carefully planned and executed using state-of-the-art techniques and equipment. We combine surgical precision with comprehensive pre and post-operative care to ensure optimal results and patient satisfaction.

specializedSurgeries.title: Specialized Surgeries
specializedSurgeries.description: Highly specialized procedures for treating complex pathologies and oncological conditions. These surgeries require extensive training, advanced skills, and comprehensive knowledge of gynecological anatomy. Procedures include radical operations for cancer treatment, removal of large endometriotic cysts, and reconstruction of anatomical structures. Each case receives individualized attention with detailed consultation, thorough planning, and expert surgical execution.
specializedSurgeries.largeCysts: Removal of Large Endometriotic Cysts (>5 cm)

plasticSurgery.title: Plastic Surgery
plasticSurgery.description: Aesthetic and reconstructive procedures of the female genital area performed with precision and care. These surgeries address both functional and cosmetic concerns, helping women feel more comfortable and confident. Procedures are performed using modern techniques that minimize scarring and ensure natural-looking results. We provide comprehensive consultation, detailed explanation of procedures, and attentive follow-up care to ensure patient satisfaction and optimal healing.

surgeryPlastic.mainTitle: Plastic and Aesthetic Gynecology — Labiaplasty, Hymenoplasty, Botox, and Rejuvenation Procedures by a Gynecologist Surgeon
surgeryPlastic.mainDescription: Aesthetic and plastic gynecology performed by an experienced gynecologist surgeon. Professional intimate surgeries including labiaplasty and hymenoplasty, as well as advanced aesthetic treatments such as vaginal rejuvenation, Botox, and tissue restoration. Personalized, safe, and discreet approach aimed at improving comfort, confidence, and feminine health.
surgeryPlastic.seoTitle: Plastic and Aesthetic Gynecology - Dr. Serge Tunitski
surgeryPlastic.seoDescription: Aesthetic gynecology: labiaplasty, hymenoplasty, vaginal rejuvenation, Botox, and intimate plastic surgery by an experienced surgeon.

plasticSurgeries.title: Important Surgeries
plasticSurgeries.description: Intimate plastic surgery procedures performed with expertise, precision, and complete discretion. These surgeries are designed to enhance both aesthetic appearance and functional comfort of the intimate area. Each procedure is tailored to individual needs and concerns, using advanced surgical techniques that ensure minimal scarring, quick recovery, and natural results. We provide comprehensive pre-operative consultation, detailed information about the procedures, and attentive post-operative care to ensure optimal healing and patient satisfaction.

myomectomy.description: Successful treatment maintaining the ability to conceive and carry a child

polyp.description: Hysteroscopic procedure restoring fertility and hope for the future
